name: BLAZBLUE CENTRALFICTION Special Edition
description:
Brace yourselves for the pinnacle of 2D fighting action - this is BlazBlue's final and most hard-hitting chapter to date, with more stages, more moves, and more characters than ever before. 

Whether you're a hardcore BlazBlue veteran, or a newcomer wanting to experience the HUGE single player mode, one thing is for certain - this is the ULTIMATE anime fighting experience!
